Header: RUHUNU UNIVERSITY TO BE OPENED FROM MONDAY
Content: The faculty of Management and Finance of the Ruhuna University will be open to the first- and third-year students and the Science faculty for the first, third and final year students on Monday. The university also will be open to the first and final year students who are following a degree in Computer Science. However, the Vice Chancellor announced that the students of the faculty of Science should come to the University with their parents on Monday.
